Max FM, nke bụbu Radio Continental, bụ ụlọ ọrụ redio FM nke Naijiria nke dị na Lagos
O nwekwara ụlọ ọrụ redio nwanne nwanyị n'okpuru otu akara ahụ na Abuja.
Redio Continental malitere n'okpuru aha Link FM na nnyefe mbụ ya na 102.3 FM na Lagos
Mgbe ọnwa iri gasịrị, a gbanwere aha ya Unity 102.3 FM, na-elekwasị anya na ntụrụndụ, akụkọ na egwuregwu.
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2017, TVC Communications nwere ihe omume na Federal Palace Hotel dị na Lagos iji mee emume mwepụta nke 102.3 Max FM

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbakwunyere ndị na-eme ihe ngosi Murphy Ijemba na Shine Begho, ma jide ndị na-egosi ihe ngosi Wale PowPowPow nke mmemme Wetin Day na Jones Usen nke TVC News.TVC kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-etinye egwu maka igwe mmadụ iri na ise ruo iri atọ na anọ
TVC Communications dochikwara Continental Broadcasting Services dị ka aha azụmaahịa maka ngalaba azụmahịa.
Na Septemba afọ 2018, TVC Communications malitere Max 90.9 FM na Abuja
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-agbaso otu usoro egwu egwu dịka ụlọ ọrụ Lagos

Ihe omume na ndị na-egosi gụnyere Max Breakfast na Jennifer Nzewunwah na Eyo Henry, Max Hits na Azuka Nsonwu; Watin Dey na Wale PowPowPow, Max Drive na Naomi Oboyi; Max Mix na Nellie, yana ihe ngosi sitere na Jones Usen na Murphy Ijemba.
